Title: Mirchi
Writer: Koratala Siva (dialogue), Koratala Siva (story and screenplay), Koratala Siva (story)
Actors: Prabhas, Anushka Shetty, Richa Gangopadhyay, Sathyaraj
Plot: A man returns to his country in order, ostensibly, to reform his girlfriend's violent family, but he seems to have a strange connection and a rather dark past.
